title: How many times are capstone reviews held in 7th sem?
content: Please tell me about how many times the capstone review will be held in 7th sem for a CSE student in EC campus. Do all of these reviews have to be done infront of the panel? I need this information as I need to decide regarding my accommodation for 4th year. Thanks.

comments.body: It depends on your guides mood
Usually you have three reviews and an "esa". Everything except the second review is in front of a panel. The second one's with just your guide.
4 in total. 1st, 3rd, and final one are in front of a panel. Review 2 is with the guide.
